hudson.tasks.Shell.command: #!/bin/bash export APP_VERSION=`cat ${WORKSPACE}/application.properties | awk -F"=" '/app.version/ {print $2}'` sed -e "s|$APP_VERSION|5.8_${BUILD_NUMBER}|" -i '' ${WORKSPACE}/application.properties echo "Replacing app.version in application.properties from $APP_VERSION to 5.8_${BUILD_NUMBER}"
